messages.title: Want to see if you qualify for the deduction and calculate it?

messages.speech:
The Business Mileage Deduction lets you deduct a fixed amount per mile you drive for business if you are self-employed. 
For 2019, you can deduct $0.58 per mile driven from your taxable income (unless you drive a taxi). 
When you're not commuting you can track your miles and earn a deduction for driving to source/ship products, meet with clients or attend a meeting away from your office. 
Want us to see if you qualify for the deduction and calculate it for you?
